title: Next.js Portfolio
desc: A developer portfolio site built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
content: This project demonstrates how to build a modern, animated portfolio site using Next.js, Framer Motion, and Tailwind CSS. It includes dark mode, responsive design, and good SEO practices.

title: DevOps Dashboard
desc: Monitoring dashboard for CI/CD pipelines and system metrics.
content: The dashboard aggregates data from multiple DevOps tools like Jenkins, GitHub Actions, and Prometheus to give real-time CI/CD and infrastructure health insights.
